channel.title: Automatic drop party ran by server?
channel.description:
Ok so I have made it so that every so often the server pops up a message saying Drop Party in 5 Minutes, then it continues to countdown for you. The point in this is so that when no mods or admins are on the server hosts a drop party in a party room... but I am not sure if I can make it actually drop items on its own.. without some assistance. Didnt a server not to long ago have a random drop in there server?
** Anyways if it is possible I would like a theory please **

item.title: Automatic drop party ran by server?

I got it working, Thanks Peter and K09

item.source: Automatic drop party ran by server?

item.title: Automatic drop party ran by server?
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

have a look at world.registerItem()

        /**
         * Registers an item to be removed after 3 minutes
         */
        public void registerItem(final Item i) {
                if(i.getLoc() == null) {
                        delayedEventHandler.add(new DelayedEvent(null, 180000) {
                                public void run() {
                                        ActiveTile tile = getTile(i.getLocation());
                                        if(tile.hasItem(i)) {
                                                unregisterItem(i);
                                        }
                                        running = false;
                                }
                        });
                }
        }

Read full topic
